name: Inverse (Mr.Mango)
description:
INVERSE - MADE FOR LiU 2022 Inverse is a game made by GoMango99 in 48 hours the for LiU 2022 game jam.  The game is about flipping a switch to go from dark to light and change up the game world. CONTROLS:

A/Left Arrow Key: Move Left

D/Right Arrow Key: Move right

SPACE: Jump

 There is a timer at the end of the short course: be sure to comment your best time!
